snippet: Ms. Scott, who had a romantic partnership with Mick Jagger, designed fashion suitable for the kind of leggy, statuesque woman she was herself.
abstract: L'Wren Scott, fashion designer whose creations were known for their discreet elegance, mixed with daring and glamour evoking her days as Hollywood stylist, dies at age 49.

byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein, Sheelagh McNeill and Marc Santora contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Ms. Scott, who had a romantic partnership with Mick Jagger, designed fashion suitable for the kind of leggy, statuesque woman she was herself.

headline.main: L’Wren Scott, Whose Designs Melded Daring and Sophistication, Dies at 49
headline.print_headline: L’Wren Scott, Whose Designs Melded Daring and Sophistication, Dies at 49
